Text: No Sound? WTF! windows media player does not play sound on my system. Any suggestions on other players that play the sound? Thanks.

you need to update your codecs. 

go here 
http://www.codecguide.com/download_k-lite_codec_pack_mega.htm
and download this mega pack (it's free) install it and your problem is solved!

(if you have any other codecs already installed make sure to remove them first!)
